reply_text: Thank you for your valuable feedback. Happy to serve you ! Team glodent!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I had pain in my gum. I visited the clinic. Doctor inspected my gum and diagnosed it was gum ulcer due to my previous medication and infection. I was explained this and prescribed medicines accordingly. I was relieved of pain and discomfort within 2 days. Then I had quick review visit with doctor and said it was healed.
reply_text: Thank you for your valuable feedback. happy to serve you !team glodent

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I went to Glodent dental for deep cleaning and a Root canal. Dr.Swarupa was very patient and took her time. She never rushed and was very thorough in her work. She was also very gentle and constantly checked if I was doing ok. The root canal was done with no discomfort and follow up visits were a breeze because of friendly staffs. I was very impressed by their work and professionalism. I highly recommended Glodent Dental.
reply_text: Thank you for your valuable feedback. happy to serve you. Team glodent

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: HI my son had dental issues where I visited some dentist in omr, I was guided wrongly that 18 teeth require treatment and the fees quoted was unimaginable. Then for second opinion  visited Glodent Dental care at Kandanchavadi , where the actual  treatment needed only for 6 teeth at affordable rate.The treatment was upto the mark.  I strongly recommend this place.
reply_text: Thank you for the valuable feedback. Very happy to serve you. happy smiling !!! Team glodent

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: She's kind and silent. I wish they explain the treatment for their patients and in F/U have a little bit of time to ask how is the braces doing any discomfort from last time and explain about the next visit. I mean I'm a medical coder so I understand what she's talking about to other orthodontics docs when she talkin something in medical terminology. But other patients I would recommend taking your time explaining what's goin on would make them beleive "oh this doc know what's goin on, I don't need to worry about anything". Otherwise she's perfect. I recommend going to her for your problems. She knows what she's doing✌️

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Dentist has not spoken *** ********** *** ******* ******** Asking the patient as what to be done. Completed 30 -40 min procedure in 5-10 min. Need to understand patient's condition, plan the procedure and spend the required time for procedure to be done. Treatment charge is high but treatment is not satisfactory..
reply_text: We are extremely sorry for your bad experience. we cross checked with our doctor . mam your chief complaint is front tooth spacing our doctor informed you that there cement filling won't stay. but your concern is to fill.  Doctor did the same. regarding the procedure time. For a midline space filling 5 to 10 min is more sufficient .if you have any problem with cement filling we Glad to treat you . you can visit our clinic any time. Regarding charge for composite filling we charged basic price. our team tried to contact you we didn't get any response from your side .AND FOR ANY CONCERN YOU CAN CONTACT US ON 9940271721. Thank you Team Glodent
